name: VQD
description:
VQD is an Adventure game with many crazy things to enjoy!
In this game you will come across a world more colorful than usual and always changing the speeds of songs for a better experience.



  • 24 levels to pass;
  • All levels aim to relax the player;
  • 22 achievements to unlock;
  • Enemies that will challenge your ego;
  • Items scattered on all levels;
  • Clothes that give you more strength and life;

Face these challenges like never before!
